caption:
The photograph shows a focused young woman, likely a researcher or student, engaged in a scientific activity. She has long, straight dark hair and wears a white lab coat identified by a name tag reading "CIM". She is in a laboratory or classroom setting, evident from the background which includes what appears to be scientific posters and the wooden frame of a chalkboard.

The woman is closely examining a small bird, holding it with a pair of forceps in her left hand while manipulating it with another tool in her right. The bird is pinned, lying on its back, which suggests she might be conducting a dissection or anatomical study as part of a scientific or educational task. The focus and detail of the work imply a delicate and precise operation, possibly for biological or veterinary study. The setting and her attire emphasize a professional, educational environment dedicated to learning and scientific inquiry.
title: Jasenka Pavicic studies the effects of heavy metals pollution on a small crab at the Ruder Boskovic Institute.
